name: Thick Light 2
description:
Description

Thick Light 2 - this is the second part of the exciting casual game, in which you have to overcome several labyrinths and escape from the guards. There are several levels in the labyrinth and on each of them you expect the dangers and difficulties that you need to overcome and solve. In order to go to the next level, you need to split 4 platforms and then the passage to which you will need to reach will open. The difficulty is that on every labyrinth there is a guard who constantly moves and tries to find you, he just has to touch you to split up and then have to start the level anew. Hide, distract and run away from the guard to get out. Also on some levels there are traps that will complicate the task and secret moves that will simplify it, use smartness to use them to your advantage. Can you get out of the labyrinths and deceive the guard?

Features

-Interesting gameplay

-Atmospheric sound

-Clever enemy

-Diverse levels
